001
002import java.util.ArrayList;
003import java.util.List;
004
005/**
006 * history
007 *
008 * @author matecsaba
009 */
010public class temperHist {
011
012    /**
013     * time
014     */
015    protected float time;
016
017    /**
018     * needed
019     */
020    protected float need;
021
022    /**
023     * measures
024     */
025    protected float[] meas;
026
027    private String line;
028
029    public String toString() {
030        String a = time + ";" + need;
031        for (int i = 0; i < meas.length; i++) {
032            a += ";" + meas[i];
033        }
034        return a;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * get word
039     *
040     * @return word
041     */
042    protected String getWord() {
043        int i = line.indexOf(";");
044        if (i < 0) {
045            String a = line;
046            line = "";
047            return a;
048        }
049        String a = line.substring(0, i);
050        line = line.substring(i + 1, line.length());
051        return a;
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * parse line
056     *
057     * @param s line to read
058     */
059    protected void parseLine(String s) {
060        line = s;
061        time = temperUtil.str2num(getWord());
062        getWord(); // who
063        getWord(); // curr
064        need = temperUtil.str2num(getWord());
065        getWord(); // meas
066        List<Float> res = new ArrayList<Float>();
067        for (;line.length()>0;) {
068            getWord(); // time
069            getWord(); // wintime
070            getWord(); // win
071            res.add(temperUtil.str2num(getWord()));
072            getWord(); // work
073            getWord(); // win
074        }
075        meas = new float[res.size()];
076        for (int i = 0; i < meas.length; i++) {
077            meas[i] = res.get(i);
078        }
079        line = null;
080    }
081
082}
